channel.title: ~ Help With SCAR needed ~
channel.description:
hello all.
im not a complete noob with scar, but this time i think i need some help :rolleyes: well basically whenever i start ANY script it says that its running and everything alright but nothing is happening, should i reinstall scar? or is something wrong with my SRL...
help greatly appreciated ;)

item.title: ~ Help With SCAR needed ~
item.dc:creator: @Tech Tech..
item.description:
@Tech wrote:

I kinda have the same thing with a few powerminers, it says nothing is wrong.
But it just stands still at the mines :(. I’m pretty new to SCAR, I used
Aryan because it was much easier and seemed more profiting.

The only SCAR script I got to work was the helper script, but I’ve only tried a
few miners and the helper.

Read full topic
